replies.body: Just bought R.I.P he keeps getting banned in rank and also the video doesnt have any sound.

The fact that you're complaining that he is banned in ranked is proof that they were right to ban him, its WHY he is banned, to stop people playing a champ they have no experience with in their ranked games.

you shouldn't have a new champ in ranked:

1. because they are almost always OP and when the enemy has them its an unfair fight.


2. if your team gets him, there is a very real possibility that someone who has no idea how he works plays him and feeds the shit outta vayne and thats gg.
(you could argue that this point negates point number 1, because the enemy team could also have this person, but no, we both know life doesn't work that way)


3. No one has played the champ enough to get a feel for him, and so don't know how to play against him properly, and would rather not have that affect their rankings.


4. Jhin jungle. Theres always that 1 %%%% that doesn't get the lane they want but still wanna play the new champ, and so they instalock the new champ in jungle or support, this is perfectly fine in normals but for some weird reason people don't want this to happen in their ranked games.

> if your team gets him, there is a very real possibility that someone who has no idea how he works plays him and feeds the shit outta vayne and thats gg.
(you could argue that this point negates point number 1, because the enemy team could also have this person, but no, we both know life doesn't work that way)
Have you seen the new ranked system? It won't allow for Jhin junglers. Unless of course they're retarded & pick jungle then pick Jhin.

Got jhin from the mystery champ of ocean week.
You wish XD{{champion:202}}

Just played him.

Yep... Jhin and i are gunna get along just fine! :D
What's your take on him? Haven't had the chance to play him yet but the Champion Spotlight was so awesome. Do you think he works better in mid or bot?

Jhin seems a bit broken to me... (25-1 in one 22 min game)
...what with all the extreme range to pick off squishy champs (like me when I play support... he was mid btw)
...and the early game damage seems OP...
...and the move speed and OP invisible traps so you can't catch him...
...and remember when crit was 'chance' and not every (n)th shot...
...and those traps plus the root seem like a lot of CC for a marksman...

That being said I do kinda like the general idea of him and his kit, I just think he is in fact (currently) broken. Perhaps that will change in the future... (after everyone has emptied their pockets to buy him).

But then again, what would I know. 'Nobody knows how to counter play him yet' ... 'He just got fed' ... 'Just because his new you say he's broken' ...
What would I know about anything. I'm just a lvl 20 scrub.

Oh and one more thing to add to my previous post:
- His mana costs are f***ing ridiculous (i.e. non-existent)

I really liked him, although i played him more for his story and voice over than his abilities and role, but his abilities are certainly much more interesting that other marksmen as well (nice change to not just have a point and click bot lane) 

I've only played him once and it was Bot lane ADC, i feel he belongs there more than the mid lane (although i haven't got mid yet) But i do think that assassins especially Zed and Yasuo are picked a lot right now (like theres one in every game i swear... its getting old..) and Fizz/Diana aren't close behind, and while Jhin has some speed boost mobility with his crits, its unreliable and certainly not enough to escape a Zed. So i don't think mid is the ideal place for him, (unless he can get really really fed before they hit lvl 6)

I'm certain Jhin will inevitably become my main bot lane ADC (i like to play champs that are interesting rather than strong, otherwise i would have picked up Vayne ages ago) but when it comes to the mid lane i think ill stick with my Azir :3

my congratulations to everyone involved in the making of Jhin though! he is a marvellous and unique design, both with kit and quotes/looks. He rival's (if not overtakes) Jinx as bot lane's most interesting and fun personality. Not only is he interesting, but he opens up some much needed insight on the lives of Zed and Shen as well. 

keep it up riot!

http://imgur.com/OpGVNp0
When i played him we spent the whole game making jhincredible puns
OMG!!! {{champion:202}} IS H20 DELIRIOUS!!!
Jhin has a clear weakness, reload, lol.
So is this new champ an ADC? because thats too much for an ADC, slow effect, stun and increase of movement speed? I hate the game already XD
Jinx has everything you just listed (and it's a snare not a stun btw)

Jinx has a lot but not all of the following:
- A slow on (E) passive
- INVISIBLE slowing and damaging traps
- A root/snare
- Virtually non-existent mana costs
- Movespeed buffs
- A (targeted) bouncing grenade with insane early game damage
- Huge range and ability to pick off squishy/low enemies with ease because of an ultimate that helpfully zooms out the map AND slows AND reveals enemies, who then die and become traps which slow and damage other enemies...
